des:
Pium is a connected home fragrance platform allowing users to personalize home fragrances with Pium capsules. Control your home fragrances and schedule them using Alexa Home.

Use Alexa Home skills to turn the Pium Smart Diffuser on and off. Add fresh capsule to your good morning routine and relaxing capsule to your good night routine. Or simply ask turn it on to enjoy fresh scent whenever you want.

To use Pium with Alexa, you need:
- A Pium Smart Diffuser
- Pium fragrance capsules
- Pium mobile app (Android, iOS)
- Link your Alexa account to your Pium account.
- Alexa devices (i.e. Amazon Echo, Echo Mini, Echo Show) or Alexa mobile app
- 2.4Ghz Wifi access

With Alexa Home skills, you can:
- "Alexa, Turn on/off the [device name]" will turn your Pium smart diffuser on and off.
- "Alexa, Turn on/off light on the [device name]" will turn your Pium smart diffuser LED on and off.
- "Alexa, turn on/off diffusing on the [device name]" will start or stop diffusing.
- "Alexa, set the scent to [capsule name]" will start scenting the selected capsule.
- "Alexa, set the intensity to weak/moderate/strong" will change the intensity of the home fragrance.
